title: Introducing: Family
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/family.jpg "family")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7508-introducing-family/attachment/family) If you’ve heard of [**Family**](http://family.bandcamp.com) it’s likely you’re into the band **WU LYF**. Their support of **WU LYF’s** UK tour has been well publicised with **Family** gaining a fair amount of support because of the news. Regardless of the partnership, Family are a band that can stand up on their own two feet. Full of glistening, strained and souring vocals blended with lo-fi tones and textures, they manage to be relatable while still straying into areas that seem new and prosperous. Their new EP is a folk fueled little gem, check it out below. Family III by Family
